Articles.Content:
Ok, then.

\*Takes a spritz bottle out\*

PerhPs you'll like this better

\*Sprays laythe in the face\*

There that makes us immune to their chemical agent

Here!

\*Hands laythe some syringes and a spritz bottle\*

If find her, get her close and use them on her.

(Hisses) Noooooo......

(Falls to the ground, unconscious)

\*rolls eyes\*

Guess I'm going hunting...
(As Sampa leaves, I open my eyes. They turn red for a second, then back to normal)
Oh, and, computer, lower the air pressure in the room I left to minimum levels.

(Wakes up, only to fall back to the ground) Whyy.. Sampa, whyyy.... (Deep breath)

- - - Updated - - -

(Falls to the ground; stops breathing. Vitals flatline)
(I said minimum levels, it puts you into a temporary sleep period because the body uses less air when sleeping)
(I'm special)
(Your ***special***)
Anyway, you notice my life signature is gone.

\*sighs\* Computer, return air levels to normal pressure.

\*goes in to restart Laythe's heart successfully\*

You are NOT dieing on me yet.

You notice that I am gone

- - - Updated - - -

I come in behind you and inject you with a tiny syringe, which is immune to your cure and fast acting
\*sighs and shakes head\* \*mutters to self\* Who's side are you on?

I run away down the hallway

- - - Updated - - -

You vision blurs and you fall unconscious.

\*problem being you forgot to put the chemical in\* Not this time

\*turns around and punches Laythe square in the face, knocking him out instantly\*

(Groans)

- - - Updated - - -

A red light envelops me for a moment, and I disappear.
\*leaves room\* Computer, lock this room and continually pump cure into it.
But I'm gone...
Disengage targets. Alter course for: gridmark 27

Dun Dun Duuuuun!

- - - Updated - - -

I have been infected with an evolved version of the disease, but it only works periodically

A far away galaxy explodes. The explosion visible trillions of lightyears away.

It doesn't affect any nearby galaxies.

The blackhole fleet arrives at the location and starts harvesting the remnants of it.

Another one of the huge star-sized blackhole ships was made.
What?
How could you keep doing that? I Specifically said you weren't to do that anymore!
Do what?
Nuax, calm yourself.
